name: Her favourite food
description:
Hi!

I'm Miguel, and i dedicate this game to my best friend; One of the things that we used to do in the past, was cooking a lot of desserts, we learnt together how to bake cookies, brownies, and all kinds of OMNOMNOM tasty and sweet stuff.

So, this is my small way of telling her thank you for all that time, and the help she gave me when i most needed.

Also, I want to thank Ludipe for the idea of this Jam. I've struggled with the design of the game until the very end, but i can say that at least i finished it ^^.

To play you only need the mouse
